experience.name: The Sheriff's Last Ride
experience.storyIntro: You've been wrongly accused of horse theft and locked up in the dusty town jail. The real thief has fled, and the Sheriff won't listen to reason. You've got to break out, find evidence, and get out of town before the hanging at sundown. Time's ticking, partner.
experience.storyOutro: You gallop into the sunset, free at last. The real thief's wanted poster in your saddle bag will clear your name. Sometimes justice has to take the reins into its own hands. Ride safe, partner.

rooms.name: Jail Cell
rooms.shortDescription: A cramped jail cell with rusty bars
rooms.longDescription: You're locked in a small jail cell. Iron bars separate you from freedom. A simple cot sits against the wall, and there's a small barred window letting in dusty sunlight. The cell door has an old lock - maybe you can pick it?

items.name: Iron Bars
items.description: Heavy iron bars that have stood here for decades, their black paint peeling away to reveal rust-spotted metal beneath. Through them you can see a narrow corridor lit by flickering oil lamps.

items.name: Jail Cot
items.description: A rickety wooden cot with a thin, stained mattress. Looks like it's seen better days.

surfaceItems.name: Thin Mattress
surfaceItems.description: A lumpy, stained mattress. Lifting it reveals nothing but dust and regret.

items.name: Brick Wall
items.description: Old brick wall with crumbling mortar. One brick near the floor looks loose...

items.name: Loose Brick
items.description: A brick that wiggles when you touch it. Might be worth pulling out.

containedItems.name: Hairpin
containedItems.description: A bent metal hairpin. Someone must have hidden this here. Could be useful for picking locks...

items.name: Cell Door
items.description: A heavy iron door, its surface scarred with the scratches and dents of past prisoners. The hinges are massive, but well-oiled - someone maintains this cell regularly.

items.name: Barred Window
items.description: A small window with iron bars. Through it you can see the main street and hear the sounds of the town.

connectedRooms.name: Cell Door
connectedRooms.description: The unlocked cell door leading to the Sheriff's office

rooms.name: Sheriff's Office
rooms.longDescription: The Sheriff's office is empty - he must be out on patrol. Papers and wanted posters cover the walls. A large wooden desk dominates the room, and there's a gun rack on the wall (sadly empty). The back door leads to the stables.

items.name: Sheriff's Desk
items.description: A heavy oak desk covered in papers and coffee stains. Has a locked drawer.

containedItems.name: Desk Drawer
containedItems.description: A locked drawer with a small keyhole.

containedItems.name: Stable Key
containedItems.description: An iron key labeled 'STABLES'. This will get you out back!

items.name: Wanted Posters
items.description: A cork board covered with faded wanted posters, their edges curling with age. Most are for cattle rustlers and bandits long since caught or dead. One poster for 'Black Bart' stands out - $500 reward, a small fortune.

items.name: Gun Rack
items.description: A wooden gun rack mounted on the wall, its pegs worn smooth from years of use. The rifles that usually rest here are absent - their silhouettes marked by clean patches against the dusty wood.

items.name: Office Window
items.description: A large window with a view of Main Street. Through the glass you can see the general store, the saloon, and townsfolk going about their daily business. The afternoon sun streams through, casting long shadows across the office floor.

items.name: Back Door
items.description: A sturdy wooden door leading to the stables. It's locked tight.

connectedRooms.name: Back Door
connectedRooms.description: The back door leading to the stables

rooms.name: Stables
rooms.shortDescription: The town stables with horses ready to ride
rooms.longDescription: The stables smell of hay and horses. Your faithful steed is here, already saddled and ready to go. The saddle bags are locked with a combination lock. You need to find the right numbers to get your escape supplies and clear your name!

items.name: Stall Door
items.description: A sturdy wooden stall door. Through the slats you can see your horse inside, pawing at the ground anxiously. Her saddle bags are hanging on a hook just outside the stall.

items.name: Saddle Bags
items.description: Weathered leather saddle bags hanging on a hook. A brass letter lock secures the flap - four rotating dials with letters A through Z.

items.name: Horseshoes
items.description: Three horseshoes hanging on the wall. They look old and well-worn.

items.name: Water Trough
items.description: A wooden trough filled with water for the horses. The wood is weathered and worn from years of use.

items.name: Stable Doors
items.description: Large wooden doors opening to the plains beyond. Freedom is so close you can taste it!

connectedRooms.name: Stable Doors
connectedRooms.description: The open plains and your escape route

triggers.name: Examine Iron Bars
triggers.description: Testing the bars reveals their strength

rewards.content: You grip the bars and give them a shake. They're absolutely solid - centuries old and built to last. No escape this way. You'll need to find another route out.
You examine the lock mechanism carefully. It's a simple tumbler lock - old fashioned but sturdy. With the right tool, something thin and flexible, you could probably pick it. You've done it before...

triggers.name: Examine Barred Window
triggers.description: Looking out the window at the street

rewards.content: You peer through the bars at the bustling street outside. The window is far too small to squeeze through, even if you could remove the bars.

triggers.name: Examine Brick Wall
triggers.description: Looking closely at the brick wall reveals a loose brick

rewards.content: You notice one brick near the floor is loose and can be removed!

rewards.description: The loose brick is now visible and the brick wall fades away

triggers.name: Cell Door Lock
triggers.description: The lock on your cell door
triggers.successMessage: With a satisfying click, the lock gives way! You're out of the cell!
triggers.failureMessage: You need something to pick the lock with.

rewards.content: The rack is completely empty - no weapons, no ammunition. The Sheriff took everything when he left on patrol. No help here for your escape.

You press your hands against the glass. The window is solid, well-built, and locked from the inside with a heavy latch. Even if you could break it, you'd cause a scene - the whole town would see. There must be a quieter way out through the back.

triggers.name: Examine Wanted Poster
triggers.description: Looking closely at the wanted poster reveals numbers

rewards.content: The wanted poster for Black Bart has numbers: 2-8-7-3

rewards.description: You discovered the code from the wanted poster

triggers.name: Desk Drawer Lock
triggers.description: A combination lock on the desk drawer
triggers.failureMessage: The lock doesn't budge. Wrong combination.

triggers.name: Back Door Lock
triggers.description: The lock on the back door to the stables
triggers.successMessage: The key turns smoothly. The back door is unlocked!
triggers.failureMessage: The door is locked. You need a key.

triggers.name: Examine Horseshoes
triggers.description: The horseshoes have letters marked on them

rewards.content: Each horseshoe has a letter stamped into the iron: S, W, and E.

rewards.description: You discovered letters from the horseshoes

triggers.name: Examine Water Trough
triggers.description: The water trough has a brand mark

rewards.content: The Triple T Ranch brand is burned deep into the wood: a bold letter 'T'.

rewards.description: You discovered the ranch brand letter

triggers.name: Examine Stall Door
triggers.description: Looking at the stall door more closely

rewards.content: Your horse whinnies softly. The word 'RIDE' is scratched into the stall door frame - perhaps by a previous prisoner who also dreamed of escape. The saddle bags hang just outside on a hook, their letter lock gleaming in the lamplight.

triggers.name: Saddle Bag Lock
triggers.description: A letter combination lock on the saddle bags
triggers.successMessage: The lock springs open! Inside you find supplies and a wanted poster for the real thief. You're free!
triggers.failureMessage: The lock doesn't turn. Wrong letters.

keys.name: Hairpin
keys.description: A bent metal hairpin, perfect for picking locks

keys.name: Wanted Poster Code
keys.description: Numbers from Black Bart's wanted poster: 2-8-7-3

keys.name: Stable Key
keys.description: An iron key that opens the back door to the stables

keys.name: Horseshoe Letters
keys.description: Letters from the horseshoes: S, W, E

keys.name: Ranch Brand
keys.description: The Triple T Ranch brand shows the letter 'T'

completionCriteria.description: Open the saddle bags to escape
